  • Flat
  • AngularJS
    • Markup
    • Javascript
    • Directive * s-calendar
  • jQuery
    • Html

    • Method
Example
{{ index }}


Flat


AngularJS
Markup
<s-pagination index="index" total="20"></s-pagination>
<div class="md-pagination md-pagination-flat"></div>
Javascript
angular .module( "demo.pagination", [ "$ui.pagination" ] ) .controller( "paginationController", [ "$scope", function( $scope ) { $scope.index = 7; } ] );
Directive * s-pagination

=index - 1

当前页数


=total - 1

最大页数


API
HTML
<div class="md-pagination"> <div class="md-pagination-nav"></div> <span class="md-pagination-normal">跳转至</span> <input type="text" maxleng="4"> <span name="go">GO</span> </div>


Constructor

$( selector ).pagination( [options] )

selector - 选择器或 DOM 元素

options - 参数设置

$( ".md-pagination" ).calendar();


Options

total - 1

最大页数


index - 1

当前页数


onPageChange - null

页数变动时触发


selector4nav - ".md-pagination-nav"

Selector of the pagination container


selector4index - "input:text"

Selector of the input box


selector4jump - "[name=go]"

Selector of the jump button




Method
.val( [ value ] )

value - Number

设置/取值 当前页数
